name: Imfagiration
description:
This is a game to say 'Happy Birthday' to a certain someone. I've only met them for a few months through an introduction by a friend in my class and we've been chatting almost everyday. All my friends at school 'barely' go on Skype anymore. Thank you and have a happy birthday.

Pretty much everything here was made in RPG MAKER MV and all of the assets were made by the creators of this fabulous program.
